text: Kay Mellor (née Daniel; 11 May 1951 – 15 May 2022) was an English actress, scriptwriter, and director. She was known for creating television shows such as ITV British drama Fat Friends (2000–05). She also co-created CITV's British children's drama Children's Ward (1989–2000). Mellor was born in Leeds, Yorkshire, England. Mellor died on 15 May 2022, four days after her 71st birthday. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English television writers Category:English television directors Category:Actors from Leeds Category:Writers from Leeds
title: Kay Mellor
